#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= 少用 else 讓程式邏輯更清楚 =

== Why ==
讓主邏輯簡潔易懂。

== What ==
程式邏輯常出現分支，這時會習慣性地用 if ... elif ... else ... 的寫法。雖然這樣寫起來很直觀，卻不易讀，容易分心在雜亂的分枝裡，而無法專心理解全局。

== How ==
=== 使用 Return Guard ===
{{{
def foo(x):
    if x < 0:
        return False
    ...
    return True
}}}
=== 使用函式和 list comprehension ===
{{{
abs_numbers = [math.fabs(x) for x in numbers]
}}}

{{{
def x_to_y(x):
    if SOME_CONDITION:
        return SOME_VALUE
    ...
    return SOME_VALUE

ys = [x_to_y(x) for x in xs]
}}}
=== 使用 Dictionary ===
{{{
import operator

def calculation(a, op, b):
    digit_names = ['zero', 'one', 'two', 'three', 'four',
                   'five', 'six', 'seven', 'eight', 'nine']
    numbers = dict(zip(digit_names, range(10)))
    invert_numbers = dict(zip(range(10), digit_names))

    operator_names = ['add', 'subtract', 'divide', 'multiply']
    operator_functions = [operator.add, operator.sub, operator.div, operator.mul]
    operators = dict(zip(operator_names, operator_functions))

    result = operators[op](numbers[a], numbers[b])
    return invert_numbers[result]

print calculation('one', 'add', 'two')  # three

}}}
